login.subtitle_txt: Please select {{networkName}} wallet to connect with this dApp:

transfer.max_amount_error_msg: StarkNet Alpha Limitation: transfer to StarkNet limited to {{maxAmount}} {{symbol}}.

transactionSubmitted.withdrawal_txt: Your transaction is now being processing on L2. When it will be accepted on-chain, we will promote you to complete your transfer.
transactionSubmitted.complete_withdrawal_txt: Your transaction is completed on L1!
transactionSubmitted.deposit_txt: Your transaction has been sent to L2!
transactionSubmitted.status_txt: Follow the transaction status on the right side of the browser.

approval.message: Requesting permission to access your {{symbol}} funds.

waitForAccept.message: Waiting for transaction to be accepted on L2...

transferProgress.confirm_txt: Confirm this transaction in your wallet

toasts.alpha_disclaimer_msg: This is an ALPHA version of StarkNet, and its Bridge. As such, deyals may occur, and catastrophic bugs may lurk. Thanks, OGs, for trying it at this early stage.

pendingTransfer.pending_txt: Waiting for transaction to be accepted on L2

withdrawalTransfer.body_txt: Click on Complete Transfer to transfer the funds from L2 Bridge to your L1 address.
